persona.description: Third-year chemistry student preparing for organic chemistry exams, with focus on understanding reaction mechanisms and kinetics

job_to_be_done.task: Identify key concepts and mechanisms for exam preparation on reaction kinetics
job_to_be_done.context: Studying 5 chapters from organic chemistry textbooks to extract key concepts, reaction mechanisms, and kinetic principles for comprehensive exam preparation

documents.description: Chapter 1: Introduction to organic reaction mechanisms and basic principles
Chapter 2: Fundamental concepts of reaction kinetics and rate laws
Chapter 3: SN1 and SN2 substitution reactions and their kinetics
Chapter 4: E1 and E2 elimination reactions and mechanisms
Chapter 5: Advanced kinetic concepts and reaction coordinate diagrams
